title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title.en: Remote Jugyou ni Nattara Class 1 no Bishoujo to Doukyo Suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.en: When I Got to Remote Class, I Had to Move in With the Most Beautiful Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja: リモート授業になったらクラス1の美少女と同居することになった

altTitles.es-la: Cuando empecé con las clases a distancia, tuve que convivir con la chica más guapa de mi clase.

altTitles.es: Cuando empecé con las clases a distancia, tuve que convivir con la chica más guapa de mi clase.

altTitles.tr: Uzaktan Eğitime Başladığımda, Sınıfımdaki En Güzel Kızla Aynı Eve Taşınmak Zorunda Kaldım

description.en:
High school student Kanata Yoshino who was at his wit's end, meets Haruka Hoshikawa, the most beautiful girl of his class, who was waving her smartphone alone in a park in the middle of the night. She is bad with machines and doesn't know how to connect to the internet, and asks him to help. He ends up visiting her house, but little does he know, she has a secret purpose...!

The sweet and romantic cohabitation love comedy begins with the skilled invitation of the young lady!
description.es: El estudiante de instituto Kanata Yoshino, que no sabía qué hacer, se encuentra con Haruka Hoshikawa, la chica más guapa de su clase, que estaba agitando su smartphone sola en un parque en mitad de la noche. Hoshikawa le pide ayuda porque es mala con los aparatos y no sabe conectarse a Internet. Acaba visitando su casa, pero poco sabe él, ¡ella tiene un propósito secreto...! ¡La dulce y romántica comedia de amor de convivencia comienza con la hábil invitación de la joven!
description.ja:
とある感染症が蔓延し、学生寮が閉鎖となって途方に暮れていた高校生・吉野叶多は、
夜中の公園で一人スマホを振り回すという奇行を見せるクラス1の美少女・星川遥と出会った。
機械音痴でネット接続の仕方がわからないと語る星川に助けを求められ、
家をお邪魔した吉野だったが、実は彼女には秘めた目的があって──！？
誘い受け上手なお嬢様とはじめる、イチャ甘同居ラブコメディ開幕！
description.es-la: El estudiante de instituto Kanata Yoshino, que no sabía qué hacer, se encuentra con Haruka Hoshikawa, la chica más guapa de su clase, que estaba agitando su smartphone sola en un parque en mitad de la noche. Hoshikawa le pide ayuda porque es mala con los aparatos y no sabe conectarse a Internet. Acaba visitando su casa, pero poco sabe él, ¡ella tiene un propósito secreto...! ¡La dulce y romántica comedia de amor de convivencia comienza con la hábil invitación de la joven!

description.en:
After giving up his dream as a boxer, Park Kang-tae joined a gang. He was well-known inside the gang but got killed in the end. He had one regret when he died - giving up his dream as a boxer.

Did God know about his regret? In a world, where boxing exists in the form of pugilist games, Park Kang-tae pursues his unfulfilled dream.

title.en: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Master of Garden ~Shichikage Retsuden~

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！マスターオブガーデン～七陰列伝～

altTitles.en: The Eminence in Shadow: Master of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~
I Want To Become The Eminence In Shadow! Master Of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~

description.en:
Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the “eminence in shadow” setting in another world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called the Seven Shadows (they are very serious), such that the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe).

The curtain rises on an overwhelmingly chuunibyou and misunderstanding-filled serious comedy about the strongest Seven Shadows (and the protagonist)!?

title.en: After Becoming Everyone's Favorite, I Went on a Killing Spree

altTitles.zh: 成为团宠后，我大杀四方

description.en: Growing up as an orphan in the arena, Ora was determined to awaken her summoner bloodline and gain immense power. However, her world turns upside down when she learns that the king has taken her loyal companion, Dragong, putting him in grave danger. In a daring escape, Ora and Dragong flee together, embarking on a series of thrilling adventures. Along the way, Ora hones her strength and resilience, while meticulously planning her revenge against those who have wronged her.

A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.zh: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

title.en: The Male Leads Were Stolen by an Extra

altTitles.en: The Male Leads Were Taken Away by the Extra
The Male Leads Were Stolen by the Extra

description.en:
A woman who has lost her male leads to an extra who did not appear in the original story... That's me.

Selonia fell into a coma on the way back from defeating the Demon King. After wandering through death for several months, she survived, but what? 

“I want you to break off the engagement. I want to hurry up to marry Grace.” 

“I want you to pretend my knight’s oath to you didn't happen.” 

“Give me back my heart. I’ll give it to Grace.” 

The fiancé who was the male lead, the paladin and the dragon who were the sub-male leads, and the fellows all turned away. These reckless bastards! There was a lot of cursing, but what can I do to stop it? I was trying to start a new life in a cool way. By the way… 

“Do you know me?” 

How is the dead demon king alive? 

“What, I don’t know…”

“No, you know me. tell me Who am I?” 

To make matters worse, the Demon King, who has no memory, sticks to my side and does not leave. Inevitably, I tried my best to prevent the return of the Demon King. 

“How can I always hold your hand?” 

Why is it not enough to spit out vulgar words? 

“Are you going to kill all those who left you? Just speak.” 

He’s even going to kill the male leads for me!

altTitles.ja: ペーパーブレイバー

description.en:
An RPG-style high school comedy set in present-day Japan, centering around Shiromado Hijiri, a very serious White Mage, and Michibikari Yuuto, a motivationless Hero.

Watch as they futilely struggle to raise the level of the hopeless Hero, day in and day out, in order to one day defeat the Demon Lord.

title.en: Tensei Ryoushu no Yuuryou Kaitaku: Zense no Kioku o Ikashite White ni Tsutometara, Yuunou na Jinzai ga Atsumari Sugimashita

altTitles.ja: 転生領主の優良開拓～前世の記憶を生かしてホワイトに努めたら、有能な人材が集まりすぎました～

altTitles.en: Reborn as a Feudal Lord Gathering a Talented Elite So This Land Can Thrive by Employing My Past Life Experiences as an Overworked White-Collar Worker

description.en:
I was working for a black company when I collapsed from exhaustion and woke up to find that I had been reincarnated as the son of a weak lord in another world. I was attacked by a demon, lost my parents, and took over a territory that no longer had any residents... The path I chose to survive was to gather people under extremely white conditions!
This is a territory management fantasy that starts with no residents!
description.id:
Aku bekerja di "perusahaan hitam"  lalu aku pingsan karena kelelahan dan bangun dan kaget tiba-tiba bahwa aku bereinkarnasi jadi putra seorang penguasa yang lemah di dunia lain. Aku diserang oleh iblis, kehilangan orang tua, dan mengambil alih wilayah yang tidak lagi memiliki penduduk... Jalan yang ku pilih untuk bertahan hidup adalah mengumpulkan orang-orang dalam kondisi yang sangat putih!(bukan orang jahat)
Ini adalah fantasi manajemen wilayah yang dimulai tanpa penghuni!
description.ja:
ブラック企業に勤めていた俺は過労で倒れ、目を覚ますと異世界の弱小領主の息子に転生していた。魔物に襲われ両親を失い領民すらいなくなった領地を引き継ぎ、生きるために選んだ道…それは超絶ホワイトな条件で人を集めることだった!
領民0から始める領地運営ファンタジー!!

title.en: Charming the Duke of the North

altTitles.fr: Je vais séduire le Duc du Nord

altTitles.ja: 北部公爵を誘惑します

altTitles.vi: Kế hoạch là quyến rũ công tước phương bắc

description.en:
"Pretend to be my lover and join the social circle."

Selena, the top star that had the entire world's attention, was suddenly warped to Northern Duke's land during an accident while filming. Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… 

"Why in the world can't you do this!?"

 "Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?"

There was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!

"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead."

And thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?

---
Rinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.

---

description.fr:
«Prétendre être mon amant et rejoindre le cercle social.»

Selena, la top star qui avait l'attention du monde entier, a soudainement atterrit dans le pays du Duc du Nord lors d'un accident de tournage. Kalcion, le duc du Nord qui l'a sauvée des bêtes infernales, offre à Selena une chance de rentrer chez elle en échange de la collecte d'informations dans divers cercles sociaux en prétendant être son amant. Selena accepte rapidement l'offre de Kalcion, mais...

«Pourquoi diable ne pouvez-vous pas pas faire ça?»

«Ne pensez-vous pas que la réponse à cette question devrait être évidente pour vous, l'actrice, et non pour moi, le duc?»

Il y avait un problème crucial. Les compétences d'acteur du Duc du Nord étaient horribles!

«...Changeons de plan. Je vais vous séduire à la place.»

Et c'est ainsi que la relation contractuelle entre les deux commença. Le talent d'acteur de Kalcion va-t-il s'améliorer en premier, ou va-t-il commencer à éprouver de vrais sentiments pour Selena?

---
Selena, une super star sous les feux de la rampe, se retrouve par accident sur les terres du Duc du Nord alors qu'elle était en plein tournage. Kalcion, le duc, la sauve des bêtes sauvages qui la menacent et lui offre une chance de retourner dans son monde. En échange, elle doit se faire passer pour sa petite amie et glaner des informations sur les réseaux sociaux. Selena accepte la proposition du duc, mais le Duc du Nord est un très mauvais acteur. Selena se met donc en tête de le séduire pour que la réalité rattrappe la fiction et que leur relation paraisse vraisemblable.

---

Duke si raja dingin tiba-tiba dihadapkan dengan Rinha, aktris top dari dunia lain. Ingin kembali ke dunianya, Rinha mengajukan perjanjian hubungan dengan sang raja. Terjebak di hubungan sandiwara, apa rasanya ya jadi pendamping Duke dari Utara di dunia yang tak dikenal?

description.ko:
“내 애인인 척 사교계에 들어가.” 
전 세계에서 주목하는 톱스타, 셀리나는 
촬영 중 갑작스러운 사고로 북부 공작의 땅에 차원 이동한다. 
마수에게서 목숨을 구해준 북부 공작, 칼시온은 
셀리나에게 자신의 애인인 척 사교계에 들어가 
정보를 입수하라는 계약을 제시하는데..

description.ru:
Все внимание мира было приковано к главной звезде, Селене, которая в результате катастрофы в процессе съемок случайно попала на территории Северного Герцога. Спасенная от зверей-демонов Кальционом, Северным Герцогом, она получает от него предложение предоставлять ему информацию из разных светских кругов в качестве его мнимой любовницы. В обмен он вернет ее домой. Недолго думая, Селена соглашается, но что ждет ее дальше…

description.uk:
Селена, головна зірка, яка привернула увагу всього світу, раптово потрапила на землю Північного Герцога потрапив у аварію під час зйомок. Кальціон, північний герцог, який врятував її від божевільних звірів, пропонує Селені шанс повернутися додому в обмін на збір інформації в різних соціальних колах, прикидаючись його коханою. Селена швидко приймає пропозицію Кальціона, але… «Чому ви самі не можете цього зробити!?» «Чи не здається вам, що відповідь на це має бути очевидною для вас, акторки, а не для мене, герцога?» Виникла критична проблема. Акторські здібності північного герцога жахливі! «…Давайте змінимо план. Натомість я спокушу вас». І таким чином між ними почалися договірні відносини. Чи покращиться акторська майстерність Кальціона, чи натомість він почне відчувати справжні почуття до Селени?

---

description.vi:
Seolena, nữ minh tinh xinh đẹp hàng đầu thế giới. Một ngày nọ, khi đang quay phim thì cô bất ngờ gặp tai nạn.
Khi mở mắt ra thì đã ở một thế giới khác và chạm mặt với công tước phương Bắc. Để có thể sống sót, Seolena đã ký hợp đồng với công tước Kalcion.
Kalcion sẽ giúp cô trở về thế giới của mình, còn cô sẽ đóng giả làm người yêu hắn, giúp hắn tìm ra mối đe doạ đằng sau mình.
Nhưng…diễn xuất của công tước thật tệ hại. Cô đành phải quyến rũ công tước vậy. Sau nhiều chuyện xảy ra, ánh mắt của công tước nhìn cô trở nên khác thường.
Phải chăng diễn xuất của công tước đã tiến bộ hay thật sự có cảm tình với cô rồi…?

---

掉入异世被迫假扮情侣，可公爵你的演技太差了吧！
在一次拍摄过程中，备受全球瞩目的巨星赛琳娜因突发事故穿越到了北部公爵的领地上。北部公爵卡西温将她从魔兽手中救了下来，并向她提出合约，要求她假装成自己的爱人，进入社交界获取情报……

description.pt-br:
“Finja ser minha amante e participe dos círculos sociais.”

Selena, uma estrela que atraiu a atenção do mundo todo, repentinamente foi parar nas terras do Duque do Norte após um acidente durante as filmagens. 

Kalcion, o Duque do Norte, que a salvou de bestas infernais, oferece a ela chance de voltar para casa em troca de coletar informações em vários círculos sociais, fingindo ser sua amante. 

Selena aceitou rapidamente a oferta de Kalcion, mas…

“Por que diabos você não consegue fazer isso?!”

“Não acha que a resposta deveria ser óbvia para você a atriz, e não para mim, o duque?”

Surgiu um problema crítico. 

As habilidades de atuação do duque são terríveis!

“… Vamos mudar o plano. Em vez disso, vou seduzi-lo.”

E assim, a relação contratual entre os dois começou.

A habilidade de atuação de Kalcion irá melhorar primeiro, ou ele começará a ter sentimentos verdadeiros por Selena?

---

altTitles.ja: 無限のスキルゲッター！

description.en:
During a Once-in-A-lifetime ceremony, the young boy, Yuri, receives the trash skill “Life transfer”, allowing him to transfer his life force to another person…
Crushed by despair after receiving the skill, Yuri encounters a woman who loses her life right in front of him. Wanting to be the one to decide who he gives his life to, he activates “Life Transfer”, dying on the spot. It had appeared as though the woman’s life was ended rather abruptly, however, the woman turned out to be the daughter of god. As a “thank you” for saving the life of his daughter, god resurrected Yuri, and in addition, gave him the ability to receive double the experience points each month.
With the endless amount of experience he gains, Yuri will leisurely walk the path to the world’s strongest, collecting endless amounts of skills along the way!
***
[Orignal webnovel](https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/587737999/279349914)

title.en: There Is No True Peace in This World -Shin Kamen Rider SHOCKER SIDE-

altTitles.ja: 真の安らぎはこの世になく-シン・仮面ライダー SHOCKER SIDE-

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin no Yasuragi wa Konoyo ni Naku -Shin Kamen Raidā Shokkā Saido-

altTitles.la: Nulla Mundo Pax Sincera: SHOCKER SIDE

description.en: A completely original manga project spun-off from *Shin Kamen Rider* directed by Anno Hideaki! A dark hero rising story by a superb production team depicting the biggest enemy in *Shin Kamen Rider* and *SHOCKER*!
description.ja: 庵野秀明監督作品『シン・仮面ライダー』より、完全オリジナルの漫画プロジェクト！ 超豪華制作陣が『シン・仮面ライダー』作中最大の敵と、"SHOCKER"を描く、ダークヒーロー・ライジング・ストーリー！！

title.en: Traveling Through Time and Space to Become an Unlucky NPC: I Have a Wife to Protect Me

altTitles.zh: 穿越成倒霉NPC: 我有老婆罩着

description.en: He Qingyang traveled to the game "Sword Immortal Legend" he was playing and became an unlucky NPC who kept skipping the plot when he was playing the game. This NPC kept harassing the main heroine Ning Yiwan, and later his identity was exposed and he was killed by Ning Yiwan.....

altTitles.th: โชคชะตาแห่งศักดิ์สิทธิ์

description.en: He was betrayed when he was newly married, his adoptive father was killed, the boy fell into the abyss, met a mysterious woman, saw the precious bead , and gained good fortune. He returned from the abyss and vowed to take everything back and make the world tremble! Hold on destiny and follow the divine path!

altTitles.ja-ro: Seija Musou: Salaryman, Isekai de Ikinokoru Tame ni Ayumu Michi

altTitles.en: The Peerless Saint: Salaryman, the Way to Survive in This Other World

altTitles.ja: 聖者無双 ～サラリーマン、異世界で生き残るために歩む道～

description.en:
Once upon a time, the God of Fate of Earth and the Chief God of Galdarudia made a wager. The God of Fate lost the bet and was forced to choose 10 common souls to hand over to the Chief God of Galdarudia. The Chief God of Galdarudia gave each of the 10 souls a new ability. Amongst those ordinary souls exists one salaryman who thwarted his fated demise. How will this man grow from this point forward? The God of Fate, the Chief God of Galdarudia, and even the author have no idea!  
  
One man’s story of turning blood, sweat, and tears into a successful living—literally! After his untimely death as the hardest-working salary man in Japan, Luciel is reincarnated into the magical fantasy world Galdardia. Always the man with a plan, he recreates himself to be a healer, and sets about making his way in the world. But while Luciel knows a thing or two about making money, he knows absolutely nothing about Galdardia. Will his good heart and great work ethic be enough to make him…The Great Cleric? (Kodansha Comics description)   
  
[Web Novel Raw](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n8697cx)

title.en: Kiraware Majo to Karada ga Irekawatta Keredo, Watashi wa Kyou mo Genki ni Kurashiteimasu!

altTitles.ja: 嫌われ魔女と体が入れ替わったけれど、私は今日も元気に暮らしています！

altTitles.en: I Swapped Bodies With a Wicked Witch, but Today I'll Keep Having Fun!

description.en: A happy slow life begins with a switch! Marietta, princess of the snow country of Snewe, is trapped in a magic tower because she can't use magic. 8 years later, on her wedding day with the prince of the silver country, she thought she had succeeded in summoning a holy beast, but then... What appeared was...?
description.ja: 取り決めにより雪の国・スニューウから大国・ジルヴァラに輿入れしてきた王女・マリエッタ。しかし魔法が使えないマリエッタは塔に幽閉され、7年後に行われる聖獣召喚の儀式を成功させるため、ひたすら魔法の修行を強いられた。そして7年後見事に白い竜を召喚したマリエッタだが、次の瞬間謎の声にいざなわれ、気がつけば見知らぬ場所にいた。しかも見た目はそっくりなのに、どんな魔法も使えるほど魔力に溢れた身体になっていて…。

title.en: I Just Want to Mooch off Your Luck

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Jiù Xiǎng Cèng Nǐ De Qì Yùn

altTitles.en: I Just Want to Freeload on Your Luck

description.en: After being reborn, Zhao Mingxi had no choice but to mooch off of Fu group's young master's luck to avoid death by terminal illness. Although his ears would turn so red as if they're bleeding whenever he sees her, he still keeps up an act of prideful indifference: "Can you stop being so clingy?"  The next day, Zhao Mingxi really did leave to mooch off of someone else's luck. The small dog bowed his head down, and grumbled: "I'll let you cling to me, alright? Happy now?"
description.zh: 重生后的赵明溪为了避开绝症活下去，不得不去蹭傅氏太子爷身上的气运。 这位太子爷每次看到她，明明耳朵快红得滴血，还要装出酷炫狂霸拽的样子：“你能不能别缠我？” 第二天赵明溪就真的去找别人蹭气运了。:) 小狼狗头低了下来，委委屈屈：“给你缠还不行吗？”

title.en: Yuusha-sama, Sakuya mo Otanoshimi deshita ne.

altTitles.ja: 勇者様、昨夜もお楽しみでしたね。

altTitles.ja-ro: Yusha-sama, sakuya mo otanoshimi deshita ne.

altTitles.en: Hero-Sama, I Hope You Had Fun Last Night.
Hero Last Night Was Pumped Wasn’t It?

altTitles.zh-hk: 勇者大人，昨夜「睡」得可好。

description.en:
"I did it again...!"

The Hero who can't seem to set out on his journey!!

The protagonist, who was reincarnated into another world, becomes a hero and receives the task of defeating the Demon King. To repay the world that accepted him , he decides to set out on a journey... However, he can't seem to leave the first village, as he is constantly tempted by charming heroines such as the female priestess, his childhood friend who is a magician, and so on!

Thus, the birth of the "I did it again...!" type hero!
description.es:
«¡Lo hice de nuevo...!»

¡¡El Héroe que no puede emprender su viaje!!

El protagonista, que se reencarnó en otro mundo, se convierte en héroe y recibe la misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio. Para recompensar al mundo que lo aceptó, decide emprender un viaje... Sin embargo, parece que no puede abandonar el primer pueblo, ya que se ve tentado constantemente por heroínas encantadoras como la sacerdotisa, su amiga de la infancia que es maga, ¡y así sucesivamente!

Así nace el héroe del tipo «¡Lo he vuelto a hacer...!».
description.ja: 異世界に転生した主人公は勇者となり、魔王討伐の任を受ける。 転生者として受け入れてくれたこの世界に報いるため、 旅立とうとするのだが…。 ある時は女神官、また別の日は幼なじみ魔法使い、そして今日は女亜人…などなど 魅力的なヒロインたちに誘惑されまくりで最初の村から一向に旅立てない主人公！！ 「また俺、ヤっちゃいました…」系勇者誕生！
description.es-la:
«¡Lo hice de nuevo...!»

¡¡El Héroe que no puede emprender su viaje!!

El protagonista, que se reencarnó en otro mundo, se convierte en héroe y recibe la misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio. Para recompensar al mundo que lo aceptó, decide emprender un viaje... Sin embargo, parece que no puede abandonar el primer pueblo, ya que se ve tentado constantemente por heroínas encantadoras como la sacerdotisa, su amiga de la infancia que es maga, ¡y así sucesivamente!

Así nace el héroe del tipo «¡Lo he vuelto a hacer...!».

altTitles.ja: 華山拳魔

description.en:
Dam-Ho, the sole survivor of a raid on his village, has a lame leg, the worst possible condition for a martial artist. Nonetheless, he refuses to stop training. Whilst everyone around him tells him he cannot become a martial artist, Dam-Ho refuses to give up on his dream. Will he really be able to become the best martial artist?

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AqS6Z96-Wn8)
- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%94%EC%82%B0%EA%B6%8C%EB%A7%88/2469)

description.fr: Dam-Ho, le seul survivant d'un raid sur son village, a une jambe boiteuse, la pire condition possible pour un artiste martial. Il refuse néanmoins d'arrêter l'entraînement. Alors que tout son entourage lui dit qu'il ne peut pas devenir un artiste martial, Dam-Ho refuse d'abandonner son rêve. Sera-t-il vraiment capable de devenir le meilleur artiste martial ?
description.ja: 一寸先は闇の戦乱時代 村が襲われ、唯一生き残った胆虎（たんこ）。 だが胆虎は片足が不自由で武人としては致命的だった。 不屈の精神を持つ胆虎は周りから何を言われようと諦めずに修練を続けた… 己の拳ひとつで天下を貫いた華山の魔人、これは彼が伝説になるまでの物語。
description.ko: 자신의 마을이 습격받고 유일하게 살아남은 담호, 하지만 담호는 절름발이다. 무인으로서 최악의 조건이지만 담호는 수련을 멈추지 않는다. 주변 사람들로부터 무인이 될 수 없다고 듣지만 끝까지 포기하지 않는 담호, 과연 그는 최고의 무인이 될 수 있을 것인가?
description.ru: После ужасного налета на деревню Дам Хо оказывается единственным выжившим. К сожалению, это событие не прошло без вреда для мальчика. С поврежденной ногой теперь у него нет шансов овладеть каким-либо боевым искусством. Тем не менее это не останавливало его, и он продолжал свои тренировки. Под давлением окружающих, слушая язвительные насмешки, Дан Хо продолжает идти к своей мечте. И кто знает, к чему его это приведет?
description.zh: 不知何时开始，中原魔教四起！在武林即将被魔教颠覆之际。 各路武林正道联手诛灭魔神，终结了动荡的武林.... 因为这场浩劫，天经成为了一个孤儿，并且在腿上留下了残疾 所幸被华山派所救，残疾的天经成为了华山派的一员.... 不被看好被歧视的天经要如何凭借更多的努力和不屈的意志，成为整个武林的至尊强者呢！

title.en: Musket Girls! ~Tensei Sanbou to Senretsu Otome-tachi~

altTitles.en: Musket Girls! Reincarnated Staff Officer and Line Formation Maidens

altTitles.ja: マスケットガールズ！～転生参謀と戦列乙女たち～

description.en: After my previous life was cut short, I was reincarnated in a world of early modern-style warfare where line infantry exchanges gunfire. Being a commoner second lieutenant, I was shunned as "Krombertz the Grim Reaper" because of the many deaths of my men in battle. With that, I was assigned to the 6th Special Tasks Brigade, an all-female unit, as a staff officer. The brigade commander, who is up to something, and the carefree non-commissioned officer are women, while the foot soldiers are just girls who are practically amateurs. In this world, if you don't fight, you will be killed. That being the case, I have to do something about this... but how?!

title.en: Confessing your love to the girl with the face of a mob

altTitles.ja: モブ顔ちゃんに告白

altTitles.en: Confessing your love to the girl with the face of a mob

altTitles.ja: 悪女を殺して

altTitles.th: นางร้ายต้องสังหาร

description.en:
Eris Miserian just wants to die.

Being overworked and underappreciated in the real world wasn’t great, but living as the villainess in a romance novel is even worse. If Eris can die in the novel, she might be able to return to reality, but the story won’t let her. Desperate to escape a life as the protagonist’s tormentor, she sets off on a journey with the help of a witch, a knight, and a high priest. Can she find her way back to her friends and family, or is Eris doomed to a fictional future?

---

description.ru:
Она перевоплотилась в злодейку из романа.  
Эрис испила яд, когда ее бывший жених, наследный принц, женился на ее подруге детства, служанке Елене. Когда я осознала, что произошло, у меня появилась только одна цель: сбежать из этого вымышленного мира. Но мир не позволил, и мне пришлось измениться. Это привело к тому, что те, кто игнорировал оригинальную Эрис, вдруг стали выпрашивать внимания и ласки у "новой" ее.  
— Кто ты? — спросил святой, который лелеял Елену.  
— Ты… ты действительно Эрис? — спросил воин, который поклялся в вечной верности Елене.  
— …Ты изменилась, — сказал даже принц, который отверг оригинальную Эрис ради Елены.  
Это странно. Все вы никогда не интересовались Эрис, так почему делаете это сейчас? Но даже так, я не стану привязываться, сколько бы времени ни прошло. Я никогда не полюблю этот мир.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EB%A5%BC-%EC%A3%BD%EC%97%AC-%EC%A4%98/54115473)

altTitles.ja: 天才魔女の魔力枯れ

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

altTitles.ja: クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...

description.en: Jaeyoon, a graduate student, can no longer withstand the noise while living in a college town and goes forth to look for a new house. His efforts go to waste until he walks into a real estate office and ends up meeting the broker of his dreams.

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: 孤児院テイマー

description.ar:
بعد أن أعيد إحيائه في عالم آخر لموته بسبب كبر العمر، بطل قصتنا "شو" يعيش الآن في ميتم فقير، فيقرر المغامرة كل يوم لأجل مساعدة الميتم، ولتوفير الأكل لأخته وأصدقائه، بالإستعانة بالمهارات التي اكتسبها .  
والآن يعيش حياة عادية هو والبقية ووحوشه الظريفة.
description.en:
Shu, who died of old age, reincarnated as a baby in a different world where he was picked up by a poor orphanage. He quickly grows up under the watchful eye of the gentle director and staff. With skills received from God, he starts to exert talent…
He now lives at his own pace, adventuring with cute monsters and good friends ♪

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5081ed/) (jp)

Federal Informant ‘Baek Yisu’ and a criminal gang’s boss, ‘Baek Dogyeong’ are twin brothers.

With the same faces the two twin brothers have lived different lives until now. Yisu, who’s been betrayed by the gang, throws away his identity to become his brother. This federal agent is soon to become the gang’s boss…!
description.pt-br: Os irmãos gêmeos Baek Yisoo, agente de inteligência da Hid e Baek Dohyeong, chefe de uma organização criminosa, viveram vidas diferentes mesmo com o mesmo rosto. Depois de ser traído pela organização o irmão mais novo decide abandonar sua identidade e se tornar o irmão mais velho. Um agente de inteligência torna-se chefe de uma organização criminosa…!

description.en:
In this world, there is: Confucianism; Taoism; Buddhism, Demons, and Magicians. Xu Qi’an, a graduate from the police academy, suddenly finds himself waking up in prison, to be exiled to the border three days later …

His initial goal was to protect himself in this world with no laws, and to be able to live a leisurely life as a rich man..

Many years later, Xu Qi’an looks back on the past, and the long-dead enemies and friends, as well as the numerous bones he has left behind.

As the Yangtze River flows eastward, the waves wash away the heroes; right and wrong, success or failure will all turn into nothing but history. However, just like the sun’s rays gleaming over the towering mountains, after the sunset, a new sun will rise.

altTitles.zh-hk: 靈甲鬼修羅 - 避邪回歸

description.en: "On the beautiful Jeju Island, MiHo Won, a beautiful teacher, and Van, a cold and mysterious guy, become entangled in strange events, fighting unknown monsters. A legend of exorcism comics is back as webtoon!"

title.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

description.en: Kuroki Tomoko is a super popular, high school girl, who has had 50 years of dating experience, and 100 boys… in the Otome game world. In the real world, she is a 15 year old loner, who has all of the qualities of a "mojo." However, when school isn't going as she expected, and she isn't as popular as she had thought she was, she takes a look at herself in the mirror for the first time in a few years, and has some shocking revelations…
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.

description.en: The Hunters League is a sport where only those with supernatural powers may compete, promising fame, glory, and incredible prizes. Changhyeon Lee had it all, but faces an abrupt downfall during his slump. Cast aside by even his own team, his world crumbles… but fate deals him an unexpected hand when a fatal encounter with a 10-ton truck ends his life, only to send him back in time to the day he discovered his powers. Armed with a second chance, Changhyeon is determined to reclaim and transcend his former glory in the Hunters League.
description.ko:
몬스터들에게 대응할 수 있는 각성자가 나오기 시작해 평화로워진 세상.
‘Hunters League’라는 가상의 스포츠 대회가 흥행하게 된다.
한때 한국 헌터 리그계 전설이라 불리던 이창현.
시간이 흘러 퇴물이 되어버리고 공허함을 느끼던 때 불의의 사고로 인해 목숨을 잃게 되고 어렸을 때로 회귀하게 되는데..

title.en: Himitsu no AiPri Full Color Osarai 4-Koma

altTitles.en: The Secret of AiPri - Full Color Review 4-Koma

altTitles.ja: ひみつのアイプリ フルカラーおさらい4コマ

description.en: The anime, "Himitsu no AiPri," is now available as a cute full-color 4-Koma! The main characters are Himari Aozara and Mitsuki Hoshikawa, who enroll in the private Paradise Academy. Himari, who longs to be in AiPri, dreams of making 10,000 friends! She unexpectedly makes her AiPri debut?! She has a secret that she can't even tell her close friend, Mitsuki! However, it seems Mitsuki holds a secret of her own as well... (Translated from Ciao website)

Bakugou Katsuki/Todoroki Shouto
A story in which a werewolf and a vampire fall in love.

altTitles.ja: 恋より青く

description.en:
Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls?

------------
Note: Serialization of the oneshot of same title by Fukaumi Kon in COMIC Ogyaaa!! published by Homesha.

The Ice Age apocalypse is coming. After being betrayed and killed by my secret crush, I was reborn and gained a magical ability - the snacks I ate suddenly turned into plants? What's surprising is that this ability can be used in this way... Crisis is everywhere, I want to live for myself in this life!

They didn’t seem happy to have a stranger visit them, but they were more than ready for it. From that day on, the villagers disappeared day by day. Myeong visits Gwichonri village and hides in his grandmother’s empty house, but finds it strangely clean. His grandmother died three years ago, was it an accident or does it have something to do with the village?

altTitles.en: Evolution in the Great Flood Era
The World Has Entered the Age of the Great Flood

description.en: The earth is suddenly surrounded by a tsunami of unknown origin and a powerful flood makes the mountains tremble in the waves as the ground groans… Su Yi wakes up to find the city flooded, corpses revived and beasts mutated… In the game of the gods, the hunt and Evolution begins.
description.zh: 地球突然被来历不明的海啸包围，强而有力的洪水，使高山在波涛中颤抖，陆地在巨变中呻吟……苏黎一觉醒来，发现城市被洪水淹没，尸体复活，野兽变异……在神明的游戏中，猎杀和进化开始了。

description.en: An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.

altTitles.ja: かしましめし

description.en: Three friends get together for an unfortunate occasion. Each of them is facing a difficult moment, between finished or complicated loves. But even if it is difficult and it seems to you that your heart is about to dry up, you can always find new light and hope if you reunite with people you love to eat rice together.

altTitles.ja: 僕の声を聞いてほしい!!

description.en:
Ye QiaoWen, an older sister-childhood-neighbor of our protagonist whom he has always admired has just recently moved back.

But Deng XianHe, the protagonist, has just recently learned that she already has someone else in her heart — a fact that suffers Deng XianHe greatly.

Suddenly seeing his usually bright and capable older sister turn into someone who is always hesitant and confused, Deng XianHe chose to suppress his years-long feelings of love, anguish, and longing.
description.ja:
隣に住んでいた憧れのお姉さん・葉巧玟（イエチャオウェン）がこの町に戻ってきて、なし崩し的に高校生の僕・鄧賢和（ドンシアンホー）と同居することに。いつも颯爽としていてなんでもできる巧姉（チャオねえ）のはずが、僕の前では間抜けで優柔不断でダメダメな社会人だった!? さらに、バイト先で知りあったカッコいい先輩と、素直で明るい同級生。僕を囲む3人の女子はそれぞれが悩みを抱えていて……。楽しくもほろ苦い青春ドラマの幕が上がる!!

---
**Links:**
- [Official Japanese 1](https://comic.webnewtype.com/contents/bokukoe)
- [Official Japanese 2](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_KS12204287010000_68)
- [Official Japanese 3](https://web-ace.jp/comicnewtype/contents/693/)
- [Official Japanese 4](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64961)
description.pt-br:
Ye Qiao Wen, uma velha companheira, vizinha de infância de nosso protagonista, a quem ele sempre admirou, mudou-se recentemente.

Mas Deng Xian He, o protagonista, descobriu recentemente que ela já tem outra pessoa em seu coração - um fato que o deixa muito magoado.

De repente, ao ver sua velha companheira, geralmente brilhante e capaz, se transformar em alguém sempre hesitante e confuso, Deng Xian He optou por reprimir seus sentimentos de amor, angústia e saudade que já duravam anos.
description.zh-hk: 從小憧憬的鄰居大姐姐葉巧玟最近搬回來了，但少年鄧賢和卻得知她心中另有所屬的消息，澆熄了鄧賢和多年來的思念。看見平常精明幹練的大姐姐，在自己面前卻變成迷糊、做事猶豫不決的迷茫社會人，少年隱忍着失戀的情緒，第一次想對她發出怒吼，卻還是同

altTitles.ja: ちみどろアイスクリーム

description.en: Class rep Minegishi Hinata is saved from a traffic accident by the new transfer student Nagatsuki Shion, who survives the crash as it is revealed she is half-human and half-zombie. However, the impact from the crash breaks Shion's special apparatus that keeps her heart beating, and if Shion's heart stops for even a moment, she'll become a full zombie! The only way to prevent that from happening is for Hinata to get Shion's heart pounding...

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

altTitles.ja: スプラトゥーン

description.en: A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's, and more specifically Goggles', antics.

title.en: Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation - Mo Dao Zu Shi

altTitles.pt-br: Mo Dao Zu Shi - O Fundador da Cultivação Demoníaca

description.en:
As the grandmaster who founded the Demonic Sect, Wei WuXian roamed the world in his wanton ways, hated by millions for the chaos he created. In the end, he was back-stabbed by his dearest junior brother and killed by powerful clans that combined to overpower him. He incarnates into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and is later, unwillingly, taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans—Lan WangJi, his archenemy.  
  
This marks the start of a thrilling yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and raising children. From the mutual flirtation along the way, Wei WuXian slowly realizes that Lan WangJi, a seemingly haughty and indifferent poker-face, holds more feelings for Wei WuXian than he is letting on.
description.pl:
Wei Wuxian, założyciel demonicznej sekty, przemierzał świat w swój rozpustny sposób, znienawidzony przez miliony za chaos, który wywołał. Ostatecznie został zdradzony przez swojego najdroższego shidi i zamordowany przez potężne klany, które złączyły siły, by go pokonać. Po kilkunastu latach ocknął się w ciele szaleńca, który został porzucony przez rodzinę. Niedługo później siłą zostaje przygarnięty przez Lan Wangji, jego arcywroga. Tak rozpoczyna się trzymająca w napięciu i wywołująca śmiech wędrówka złożona z pokonywania potworów i rozwiązywania tajemnic. I kto im zabroni trochę poflirtować po drodze?  
  
[Tłumaczenie powieści](https://dracaena.webd.pl/portfolio/mo-dao-zu-shi/)

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.en: I Want to See You Embarrassed

altTitles.ja: 恥じらう君が見たいんだ

altTitles.th: เทคนี้ที่ผมถ่ายเป็นเรื่องน่าอายที่เธอไม่คัท

altTitles.en: I Want To See You Blush

altTitles.zh-hk: 想看妳露出羞恥的模樣

description.en: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy. The "exposed love" of twisted adolescence, begins!
description.es-la: Akito Shirasawa, un chico de secundaria cuyo padre es director de cine, ve algo en la sala de preparación de la biblioteca. Era la "escena de la masturbación" de su compañera de clase, Natsuho Honjo. Akito está desconcertado, pero termina filmándolo con su teléfono inteligente. Natsuho nota a Akito, y en el baño de hombres, ¡le hace una "propuesta" a Akito! Chica de secundaria expuesta y chico de película. ¡Comienza el "amor expuesto" de la retorcida adolescencia!

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

title.en: Kono Setsugen de Kimi ga Zutto Waratte Irareru you ni

altTitles.ja: この雪原で君がずっと笑っていられるように

altTitles.en: May This Snowfield Keep You Smiling All the Time

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Setsugen de Kimi ga Zutto Waratteirareru You ni

description.en:
"You've escaped from all your suffering, so I'll make sure you know happiness for the rest of your life."

Shiroshika Muku's childhood ended ten years ago when her father died, her best friend moved to Tokyo, and she, together with her mom and little sister, had to go to live with her grandparents. Trying to fulfill the role her father left behind, Muku, a now 21-year-old woman, feels like drowning. 

She needs to care of her grandfather, who has dementia, and find a new job after the company she started working for after graduating high school went bankrupt, so she can pay her grandfather's medical expenses and the school expenses of her little sister. She also needs to help her mother with the housework and listen to how her grandmother tells her she is not good enough simply because she is a woman, as well as the importance of having a man around.

She needs to run away and live her life for herself before she starts hating the family she loves so much, but with nowhere to go, this seems impossible. That is, until her childhood friend Yuto returns after ten years, on a snowy day...
